page.title: 09CRANFORD COMMUNITY SCHOOL
page.content: evening of local bands. During the weekend of Festival Week a Bar-b-que, barn dancing and a Teddy Bears Picnic will take place. Throughout the whole week, a varied programme of Asian Arts will take place. As well as providing enjoyment, it is hoped that the week will raise money for a variety of charities e.g. the Bhopal Disaster and provide future funds for the Community Council. The organisers hope that the activities will suit every sort of person from seven to seventy. The role of the Co-ordinator is to make sure that every event runs smoothly and a committee of six people supervise the whole week. So that parents can make full use of the community school, a creche is provided for children of 2.5 years and above. There are two people who run
